parameter.name: DefaultConnection-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: DefaultConnection Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.

parameter.name: KagiderContext-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: KagiderContext Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultValue: user id=sa;pwd=1;data source=.;persist security info=False;initial catalog=KagiderDB

parameter.name: KagiderContext_DatabasePublish-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: KagiderContext_DatabasePublish Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
